Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game with mobile controls, real-time synchronization, and persistent save systems. Players explore procedurally generated worlds, mine resources, and interact through an admin-controlled network using MQTT. The game features a day-night cycle, explosion mechanics, and a shop system for upgrades and items.
